install.name: YOOsearch
install.author: YOOtheme
install.description: YOOsearch module of the YOOtheme club (http://www.yootheme.com) for Joomla! 1.5.

param.name: box_width
param.label: Result box width (px)
param.description: Search results box width in pixels

param.name: char_limit
param.label: No. of chars in Result text
param.description: Maximum no of chars in result text

param.name: res_limit
param.label: No. of Result Items
param.description: Maximum no of result items to display

param.name: cat_limit
param.label: No. of Category Items
param.description: Maximum no of category items to display

param.name: categories
param.label: Categories
param.description: Define additional search categories. Syntax: {cat title=[headline] image=[path/image.png] keywords=[joomla, name]}Description text{/cat}

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
